ProductInfo.Features:
Swann's state-of-the-art blue-lit hybrid DVR with 6 channels including 2 channels of High Definition 1080p & 4 channels of High Resolution D1
High definition, perfect when close identification is needed on license plates, faces, clothing colors etc
1080p channels feature near real-time 15fps per channel recording & playback in 1080p full HD
Includes 2 x high definition 1000TVL cameras capable of generating super clear 2.1 Megapixel (1920 x 1080 pixels) 1080p video with IR cut filters for powerful night vision up to 115ft/35m & up to 170ft/50m in ambient light
A weather-resistant rating of IP66 for indoor or outdoor use
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWHDK-681002-US Hybrid 6 Channel Digital Video Recorder (Black)
